meanings.definition: The state of not residing in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: Her nonresidency in the city made her feel disconnected from the community.
meanings.sent2: The nonresidency of the traveler meant they didn't have a permanent home.
meanings.sent3: His nonresidency in the neighborhood led to rumors that he was a secret agent.
meanings.sent4: The nonresidency of the ghost in the old mansion added to its mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonresidency became clearer to her after living abroad for a year.
